This is a simple sample quarto report.


```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(gt)
library(readr)
library(stringr)

readr_example("chickens.csv") |> 
    read_csv() |> 
    mutate(motto = str_to_sentence(motto)) |> 
    gt()
```
